у меня наигранно 50 + - часов в овере,но даже этого времени хватит,чтобы понять что игру делали покуривая марихуану, пока овер не перешёл на FTP, игра казалась классной,было много интересного контента,но в последние годы(до выхода 2-й части) разрабы готовились к выходу данной игры и контента не было вообще,все ожидали прикольный шутер 5 на 5,который оставит в себе стилистику овервотч,но появилось вот это, как я зашёл(на второй день выхода) я просто напросто не мог зайти,но в итоге оказалось,что каким-то чудом близард смогли знатно обосраться с выходом игры,лутбоксы стали платными,все скины платные и т.д.
И что в итоге мы получаем: 
Донат на каждом шагу,плохая оптимизация,(провал с выходом игры можно не учитывать из-за того,что это было год назад) ну как бы и всё

완성도가 끝내주는 게임을 업데이트를 안 하고 방치한 무능력한 블리자드.
무엇이 문제였기에 이 게임의 업데이트에 손을 놨을까?
PVE는 파쿠리한 게임인 팀포2에 수두룩빽빽하고
신캐는 아무렇게나 내도 사람들이 환호했을 것이다. 밸런스는 어차피 모든 게임에서 영구히 풀지 못하는 숙제니까 둘째치고 사람들은 아무튼 신캐를 보고싶어했다.
스토리는 어째서 진행이 없나? 나는 오버워치가 해체된 이유를 오버워치 베타때부터 궁금해했으나 알지 못했고, 블리자드가 내게 알려준 건 어두컴컴했던 과거가 아닌 어두컴컴한 성벽이었다.

그러나 다행히도 나의 블리자드에 대한 신뢰감은 높다.
NC와 같이 어떤 게임을 만들더라도 쓰레기일 것이 분명할 거란 믿음.
오버워치를 접은 이후로 이 믿음은 아직 깨진 적이 없다.

I loved Overwatch. It was at one point my favorite FPS game back in the day. Before I quit OW1 due to the game not getting updates, I reached mid diamond and was a Tank main. (Reinhardt and Roadhog) Overwatch 2 feels like a downgrade compared to Overwatch 1. Overwatch 1 wasn't perfect by any means. At the very least, OW1 whether having good and bad games felt rewarding. OW2 however made the issues that were in OW1 much worse. This series has been ruined for me. As much as I would love to see the game succeed. Blizzards stubbornness and desperate greed will be their downfall and it makes me sad.

Overwatch 2 has: 

-Fun but also horribly balanced gameplay

-Competitive is hardly functional, the last time I played, I ran into players that were 3 competitive ranks below or above me.

-Competitive toxicity is extremely prevalent in the community, especially racial and discriminatory slurs that don't get addressed. Yet people can get banned for simply saying the F bomb. Potentially really biased reporting system. 

-Gatekeep heroes behind a battlepass that hardly rewards you for completing it, Causing FOMO. The Battle pass is awful. Especially the free pass.

-Stupidly overpriced skins. Blizzard was once a more generous company. Now they're greedy and desperate, especially due to allegations and lawsuits (which they 100% deserve). I understand wanting to make money, but how do you go from free skins to a legendary skin being over 20 dollars. Skins should be priced so much lower.

-The Developers maybe listen to 20% of what the community wants and the other 80% is spitting in the faces over everyone who loves Overwatch. So many people spoke out against issues, especially the overpriced skins to just be ignored.

-Worse events (For crying out loud, they gave a Winged Victory Mercy skin that was once free in OW1 AS AN EVENT REWARD and their current events ADVERTISE THEIR OVERPRICED SKINS)

-They cancelled the indepth PvE... Yknow, the whole point of being a SEQUEL??? The snippets they have left CHARGE YOU 40 DOLLARS FOR 3 MISSIONS. I can play Elden Ring and have so much more hours of gameplay than like maybe 2 hours of gameplay at most with OW2. 

-There is no feeling of progression anymore, which OW1 had. They shove the stupid battle pass in your face. (Levels and the border changing when you reach a certain amount of levels)

In conclusion: OW2 while being a fun experience, was much more fun when it was OW1. Do yourself a favor and play another game. Don't get yourself into this game, it's not worth it. If you want good FPS games, there is better out there. It makes me sad to say this but this games negative reputation is sealed and there is no coming back from it.
